comment_text: Regarding the Companies Act amendment, I fully support the proposed changes to Section 135. This will enhance corporate social responsibility.
The proposal to increase the compliance burden for Limited Liability Partnerships is deeply concerning and should be reconsidered. We are opposed to this clause.
Clause 12(b) of the draft is ambiguous. Could the Ministry please clarify if this applies to foreign subsidiaries or only domestic holding companies?
I suggest that for Section 42, the timeline for private placement offers should be extended from 60 days to 90 days to allow for better due diligence.
This is a welcome move by the MCA.
This draft legislation is completely unacceptable and will harm small businesses.
